report.title: Filterable occurrence taxa count per user/website.
report.description: Return a count of distinct taxa associated with occurrences a user has created for a given website. Report can be supplied a filter from the filters table.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE o.website_id=#website_id# AND o.created_by_id=#user_id# AND #sharing_filter# #idlist#
